TopicTitle: Wll KSP everget its two promised Gas Giants

Articles.Content:
Years ago (2013), Nova announced in a post that there would be two more Gas Giants (Eeloo was supposed to be a moon of Gas Giant 2) My question after years is: Will the Gas Giants ever be added or is SQUAD focusing on other things?

Early version of Gas Giant 2 (posted years ago):
Maybe it will. IDK. In b4 lock.
I really hope this will be implemented.
Hope springs eternal - or so they say.
There are mods in the mean time that are getting better and better at it.
I hope that it will be a DLC. My my poor old lemon-powered laptop is already burning up, due to my large amount of mods.
Hopefully not before the current planets get a makeover.
Meh. Someday, who knows. Clearly, Squad is focused on other things. And, I'm OK with the focus on other things

I would much rather them make a downloadable 'planet editor' tool than add more planets, and have configs and textures for what would have been GP2. That way the people with crappy computers don't get upset, the modding community can stop hacking, and people can use the planets they want to use.

My guess for GP2 is "not going to happen anytime SoonÃ¢â€žÂ¢", but then again, I thought new aero wasn't ever gonna happen, so take that with a grain of salt.

Squads are subtle and quick to randomly add features~

I would much rather them make a downloadable 'planet editor' tool than add more planets, and have configs and textures for what would have been GP2. That way the people with crappy computers don't get upset, the modding community can stop hacking, and people can use the planets they want to use.

THAT would be cool. I'd support that 100%. Well, if it was implemented correctly, etc.
I could make then with KopernicusTech if you guys want me too.

I feel eventually they will add more planets, but for the time being the solar system as it is, it's sufficient. I mean, even though most planets are based off of ours, it's not unheard of that a solar system exists with only 1 gas giant and many rocky planets.

I could make then with KopernicusTech if you guys want me too.

Yes!!! Please! PM me if you do and include gp3 and the moons!

Plz keep Eeloo separate.
despite also wanting more things to do on the actual planets/moons, i still fully support finishing the kerbin system with one more gasplanet.

I could make then with KopernicusTech if you guys want me too.

Don't bother: Outer Planets Mod fills that exact role, with three new gas giants, and Eeloo changed to an Enceladus analog.
No. 5char

Much as I'd love more bodies to visit, I'd rather any planet development time was spent making the current ones more varied and interesting, with more and different things to do at each of them and more Easter Eggs to discover.

I see a big planet update. More easter eggs on existing, and newer planets and moons would be great.

Its not a big factor for current 1.0 release as these are not very important compared to the many stock ingame features that are coming with the full release of the game.

Hands down though mods already have this more or less handled. So it would be great, but not the end of our world if it doesnt ever happen haha.

I remember them saying on a Dev Stream (before Squadcast was even a thing) they had problems with memory and some other stuff and that's why they didn't implement more planets than we have now.

Quick edit: though I hope that is not a thing anymore

Much as I'd love more bodies to visit, I'd rather any planet development time was spent making the current ones more varied and interesting, with more and different things to do at each of them and more Easter Eggs to discover.

This: and from what I've heard, Outer Planets fills the need for more gas planets perfectly if you simply can't wait.
Eh, gas giants aren't that exciting to me.
I'd like more planets but a stock system for the player to make planets would be better. Especially if they could be shared like craft.

Well, 1.0 is literally right around the corner. I'm not in favor of being all impatient for new stuff when the game is finally officially released, myself. The planets will come, we'll just have to wait.
I moved this to a more appropriate sub-section

Honestly? I don't really care about Gas giants.

I mean...you can't land on them and satellites are useless currently so...
